attributes.action: Europe.  Stay or leave.  Let the country have a say - give us a referendum.
attributes.additional_details:
Much has been said about decisions made in Brussels that we do not like in the United Kingdom.  We did not vote on the EU Treaty when many people thought we should have had the chance.

Therefore, the signatories of this petition call on the Government to offer the United Kingdom a choice - to stay in the EU or leave.
